Title: Haunted Honeymoon
Actors: Gene Wilder, Gilda Radner, Dom DeLuise, Jonathan Pryce
Plot: Larry Abbot, speaker in the radio horror shows of Manhattan Mystery Theater wants to marry. For the marriage he takes his fianc√©e home to the castle where he grew up among his eccentric relatives.
